about_the_game:
Four Elite Warriors (FEW) - Get ready for a team bloodbath!

Tired of the same old action games? Looking for chaotic, wild fun with your pals? Then Four Elite Warriors is the perfect game for you!

In a local multiplayer deathmatch between two to four players, yo will be able to eliminate your fellows in such many ways, with diferents kind of weapons that will randomly spawn in the scenary, that one, that you can choose before the match start. have you been hit and are you bleeding. and of course you don´t want to be one of the first bloods (it´s not so bad anyway, you will respawn in five seconds) you can pickup one of the health box. You are out of ammo, and are still shooting with no end, and harming no one? you can hit them or take one ammo box from field. Once match starts, you must be the first to reach five kills, (but not five deaths) to win the battle and everything starts over.

Gather three friends (or enemies) and get ready for an epic battle brimming with laughter, betrayal and explosions. Pick from a cast of loony characters and get rid of your opponents however you want:

Burn‘em,

Shoot’em,

Hammer them

Make them explode

Blow them away with your bazooka

And enjoy your victory in slow motion

Survivor mode will be availeble soon, so you can rest for killing each other and work together in co-op modem, you must survive as much hordes you can, but be careful, not everytinh is so simple, cause frindly fire it´s always on (so you can revenge from thoose who make you loose previously).

Four Elite Warriors was crafted with love by Jamceco, an independent three-person studio from Argentina. Don’t expect AAA graphics or a deep plot, but simply thrilling action, joy and plenty of chaos to enjoy with friends.

Play, enjoy and give us your positive review.

Bye

name: Four Elite Warriors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 / AMD Radeon 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Four Elite Warriors: chaos, laughter and explosions with friends! Tired of the same old action games? Unleash the carnage with your friends in FEW! Pick your favorite loony character, eliminate your opponents however you want and prepare yourself for an epic battle brimming with joy and explosions!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
